mapper.insert: insert into t_report (reportid, reportcontent, questionid, userid, status, answerid, createDate, commentid) values (#{reportid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{commentid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_report set reportcontent = #{reportcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, questionid = #{questionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answerid = #{answerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, commentid = #{commentid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where reportid = #{reportid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select reportid, reportcontent, questionid, userid, status, answerid, createDate, commentid from t_report where reportid = #{reportid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select reportid, reportcontent, questionid, userid, status, answerid, createDate, commentid from t_report

select r.*,u.username,q.title from t_report r ,t_user u,t_question q where r.userid=u.userid and r.questionid=q.questionid and r.questionid !=0
and r.reportcontent like '%${reportcontent}%'
and q.title like '%${title}%'
and r.status=#{status}

select r.*,u.username,a.answercontent from t_report r ,t_user u,t_answer a where r.userid=u.userid and r.answerid=a.answerid and r.answerid !=0
and r.reportcontent like '%${reportcontent}%'
and a.answercontent like '%${answercontent}%'
and r.status=#{status}

select r.*,u.username,c.content from t_report r ,t_user u,t_comment c where r.userid=u.userid and r.commentid=c.commentid and r.commentid !=0
and r.reportcontent like '%${reportcontent}%'
and c.content like '%${content}%'
and r.status=#{status}
mapper.update: update t_report set status='0' where reportid=#{id}
